acts.act: Protection of children from sexual offence act 2012

business_details.Business: Accused Jan Tokbi  produced from jail hazat and they are further remanded till next date.     The accused person has express his inability to engaged defence counsel. Hence Sri Shymal Sil, Advocate of Diphu Bar Association is hereby appointed has Legal Aid Counsel  from the panel prepared by the D.L.S.A, Diphu Karbi Anglong. Furnish copy to the Legal Aid Counsel.     PWs absent. Summons issued to PWs not yet returned. Issue fresh summons to PWs.      Fixing 30.01.20 for Production Evi.

Present- Sri Kalyanjit Saikia(AJS)Addl. Sessions Judge,Karbi Anglong, Diphu   Case record is received from Honble Sessions Judge,Karbi Anglong, Diphu for disposal.     Accused person namely Jan tokbi is produced from Jail Hazot. He is again remanded to Jail Hazot till next date.    PWs absent. Summons issued to PWs not returned. Issue fresh summons to PWs.
aacd jon Tokbi is produced from jail hazot and remanded till next date.       the informant was present who was examined , cross examined and discharged,     issue summon to victim.
accd Jaon Tokbi produced from jail hazot and remanded till next date.       victim present but could not be examined as the court is busy recording statements. issue fresh summon to the victim.
accd Jan Tokbi produced from jail hazot and remanded till next date.         the victim was present who was examined , cross examined and discharged.       issue summons to remaining PWS.

A supplementary case record has been opened as per the notification passed by the Hon&#039ble Guwhati High Court dated 24/03/2020. Court work is disrupted due to COVID-19.Accused Jan Tokbi is produced through video conferencing from the jail hazot and he is further remanded till next date.
court works disrupted due to COVID 19 National Lockdown
court works disrupted due to COVID 19 National Lockdown.    accd Jan tokbi produced through video conferencing and remanded till next date.
